## Second slide

Type any R code in the chunk and check the result:

```{r, echo = FALSE}
source('clean_data.R')
library(tidyverse)
library(igraph)
library(ggraph)
library(tidygraph)

graph <- tbl_graph(nodes = programming_languages_tibble,
                   edges = influences_tibble, directed = TRUE)
```
```{r, echo = FALSE}
centraility <- graph %>%
        activate(nodes) %>%
        mutate(degree = centrality_degree(mode = 'in')) %>%
        filter(degree > 0) %>%
        arrange(-degree)

centraility %>% ggraph(layout = 'fr') +
  geom_edge_link(aes(alpha = stat(index)), show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_node_point(aes(size = degree), show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_node_text(aes(label = name, color = 'blue'), show.legend = FALSE)


```
